articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Australian war crimes whistleblower David McBride jailed for six years - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Eight years after Australia began investigating war crimes in Afghanistan, a whistleblower is the first to be punished.
articles.content:
Former Australian Army lawyer David McBride has been sentenced to five years and eight months for revealing information about alleged Australian war crimes in Afghanistan.
Supporters of McBride have… [+5300 chars]
